H0.text: What type of acid is extracted from the juice of lemons, oranges, limes, and grapefruit. Citric Acid

H1.text: What type of acid is extracted from the juice of lemons, oranges, limes, and grapefruit. Malic Acid

H2.text: What type of acid is extracted from the juice of lemons, oranges, limes, and grapefruit. Tartaric Acid

H3.text: What type of acid is extracted from the juice of lemons, oranges, limes, and grapefruit. E330

A4.text: citric acid was first isolated from lemon juice

A5.text: The concentrations of citric acid in citrus fruits range from 0.005 mol/L for oranges and grapefruits to 0.30 mol/L in lemons and limes
